description: Apply for financial help to make your home suitable for a disabled person

details.introduction: You can apply to your local council for a disabled facilities grant. The grant helps you adapt your home to make it suitable for a disabled person.
details.more_information: • Find out how to apply if youâ€™re in Northern Ireland

details.benefit: can get financial and other help with any challenges to my daily living
details.goal: apply for the schemes, grants and services available to get financial support and fund equipment, modifications to my home etc
justifications: It's something the government provides/does/pays for

meets_user_needs.title: As a disabled person, I need to apply for the schemes, grants and services available to get financial support and fund equipment, modifications to my home etc, so that can get financial and other help with any challenges to my daily living (103508)
